description:
Whether you want a warmth boost for cold mornings, a throw-on piece for post-climb downtime or a technical layer for backcountry hikes, our Capacitor Pull-On is the definitive all-mountain midlayer.

As a fresh take on the classic multipurpose 200-weight fleece, our ultra-comfortable Capacitor Pull-On is designed to keep you warm and dry without any restriction in movement. Built from 100% recycled knit-face brushed fleece and lighter Thermic™ stretch side panels for a trim, athletic fit and flexibility during arduous climbs. Pared back and simple at just 355g, it's packable and insulating. Key features include a pair of mesh-lined side pockets with YKK® zips, a 1/3-length front zip and a low-profile collar with soft chin guard.

Built to work seamlessly between a technical baselayer and a weatherproof shell, the Capacitor Pull-On delivers all the breathable insulation you need for active mountain sports.
name: Rab Capacitor Pull-On - Mens

specs.value: Thermic stretch fleece with brushed back, 175g
